verses.text: But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.

Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not: the works that I do in my Father's name, they bear witness of me.

That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.

Now, my son, I would not that ye should think that I know these things of myself, but it is the Spirit of God which is in me which maketh these things known unto me; for if I had not been born of God I should not have known these things.
But if ye believe not his writings, how shall ye believe my words?

For behold, this is written for the intent that ye may believe that; and if ye believe that ye will believe this also; and if ye believe this ye will know concerning your fathers, and also the marvelous works which were wrought by the power of God among them.
And now Father, I pray unto thee for them, and also for all those who shall believe on their words, that they may believe in me, that I may be in them as thou, Father, art in me, that we may be one.

verses.text: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,

similars.text: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.
And again, they were wroth with him when they had arrived in the promised land, because they said that he had taken the ruling of the people out of their hands; and they sought to kill him.

verses.text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized; and there he abode.
